text: The 1921 Colorado Silver and Gold football team was an American football team that represented the University of Colorado in the Rocky Mountain Conference (RMC) during the 1921 college football season. In its second season under head coach Myron E. Witham, the team compiled a 4–1–1 record (4–0–1 against RMC opponents), finished second in the conference, and outscored opponents by a total of 65 to 63. ==Schedule== ==References== Colorado Category:Colorado Buffaloes football seasons Colorado Silver and Gold football
title: 1921 Colorado Silver and Gold football team
